text: The took place on 24 September 1877, in Kagoshima, Japan. It was the final battle of the Satsuma Rebellion against the Imperial Japanese Army. The battle ended in the death of the Revolt's leader, Saig≈ç Takamori, and the destruction of his army. == References == Category:1877 Category:19th century in Asia Category:Battles involving Japan
title: Battle of Shiroyama
